summary: GPT-6 expected H1 2026, but no firm date. Currently on GPT-5.3-Codex as of Feb 2026.
content:
Key findings:
1. OpenAI confirmed GPT-6 will NOT launch in 2025
2. Sam Altman said gap between GPT-5 and GPT-6 will be shorter than GPT-4 to GPT-5 gap
3. Early speculation: private previews mid-2026, public release later 2026 or early 2027
4. Some sources say "first half of 2026" for most likely release
5. As of Feb 2026, OpenAI is on GPT-5.3-Codex (released Feb 5, 2026), GPT-5.1 released Nov 2025
6. OpenAI has acknowledged capacity constraints - better models ready but can't deploy due to insufficient compute
7. Manifold market for "GPT-6 before June 1, 2026" is at ~17% probability
8. Manifold market for "GPT-6 released in 2026" is at ~76%
9. No GPT-6 announcement or release has happened as of early Feb 2026
10. OpenAI is still iterating on GPT-5.x series (5.1, 5.3-Codex)
